Battle of the Bulge.Date: 16 December 1944 – 25 January 1945(1 month, 1 week and 2 days)
Battle of the Bulge.Result:
Allied victory

Western Allied offensive plans delayed by five or six weeks.[1]
German offensive exhausts their resources on Western Front.
German collapse opens way for the Allies to ultimately break the Siegfried Line.
Soviet offensive in Poland launched on 12 January 1945, eight days earlier than originally intended.[2]
